elements.Text: Will you be able to do the laundry tomorrow?

elements.name: Forgetting the Laundry_Presymptomatic_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.

elements.text: Remember, the more you practice thinking about situations in new ways on our app, the more you'll be able to think positively about scary situations in your life!
